name: Pocket Trader. Business Tycoon
description:
Are you ready to become the best Pocket Trader? Trade with ancient civilizations and do all in your power to grow a great business! Start buying and selling goods to make a profit and travel between all those towns!

You have plenty of amazing good types to choose from, ranging from bronze to rubies, salt, wine, spices, medicine, fish, fruit, coal, grains and even poison. As you play and earn more money you will be able to trade more goods and upgrade your caravan in order to carry more cargo.

If you want to stay safe on the road, you have the ability to hire mercenaries as they can help protect you. Keep in mind though that they have to be paid otherwise they will just go away. Use these mercenaries to battle savages that try to steal your cargo.

As you play, you can acquire illegal goods but you have to be aware of the guards as they can catch you. Pocket Trader comes with a wonderful quest system that will always keep you coming back for more as you explore more gameplay options and have fun. There are 5 islands to explore and online leaderboards you can access, so just download this game and check it out, you are bound to enjoy these great trading adventures!

Features:
• Multiple types of goods to sell
• Great quest system
• Explore 5 different islands
• Trade with ancient civilizations
• Hire mercenaries to protect you
• Easy to use upgrade system
• Wonderful graphics
